= Download =

The latest [http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/files/jbiowh-3.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar jbiowh-3.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar] stable version. 

Check the [SystemRequirements System requirements] and the [InstallationGuide Installation Guide] before use it.

The MySQL script to create the relational database is [http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src/main/resources/schema/mysql/warehouse.sql warehouse.sql]

Older versions [http://code.google.com/p/jbiowh/downloads/list here]. 

== !JavaDoc ==

The latest [http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/javadoc/index.html JavaDoc] generated.

== MySQL Workbench Project ==

Download [http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src/main/resources/schema/mysql/MySQLWorkBench/warehouse.mwb MySQL Workbench Project] to visualize and modify the relational schema. 

= Upgrades =

== Upgrade a relational schema from 2.1.3 to 3.0.0 ==

Download [http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src/main/resources/schema/mysql/updates/warehouse-2.1.3-to-3.0.0.sql this] script to upgrade an existing relational schema from version 2.1.3 to 3.0.0.


== Upgrade a relational schema from 2.1.2 to 2.1.3 ==

Download [http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src/main/resources/schema/mysql/updates/warehouse-2.1.2-to-2.1.3.sql this] script to upgrade an existing relational schema from version 2.1.2 to 2.1.3.

== Upgrade a relational schema from 2.1.1 to 2.1.2 ==

Download [http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src/main/resources/schema/mysql/updates/warehouse-2.1.1-to-2.1.2.sql this] script to upgrade an existing relational schema from version 2.1.1 to 2.1.2.

== Upgrade a relational schema from 2.0.7 to 2.1.1 ==

Download [http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src/main/resources/schema/mysql/updates/warehouse-2.0.7-to-2.1.1.sql this] script to upgrade an existing relational schema from version 2.0.7 to 2.1.1.

== Upgrade a relational schema from 2.0.3 to 2.0.7 ==

Download [http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src/main/resources/schema/mysql/updates/warehouse-2.0.3-to-2.0.7.sql this] script to upgrade an existing relational schema from version 2.0.3 to 2.0.7.

== Upgrade a relational schema from 2.0.2 to 2.0.3 ==

Download [http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src/main/resources/schema/mysql/updates/warehouse-2.0.2-to-2.0.3.sql this] script to upgrade an existing relational schema from version 2.0.2 to 2.0.3.

Note that the upgrades are NOT accumulative. Therefore, you have to execute them sequentially.

From the MySQL client run:

{{{
   source <path-to-downloaded-sql-script>;
}}}
